citations.desc: Attending veterinarian and adequate veterinary care (dealers and exhibitors).
citations.narrative:
No written Program of Veterinary Care (PVC) was available during this inspection until the inspector contacted the AV by
phone. A copy of a 2018 PVC was provided by email. The 2018 PVC does not accurately reflect the species present
during this inspection. The PVC includes species no longer held by the exhibitor (sugar glider, possum) and does not
document all current species (rabbits). The AV has not been to the facility since October 2020 and the PVC has not been
updated since 2018. Each exhibitor shall employ an AV under formal arrangements. In the case of a part-time AV, the
formal arrangements shall include a written program of veterinary care and regularly scheduled visits to the premises of
the exhibitor.

citations.desc: Attending veterinarian and adequate veterinary care (dealers and exhibitors).
citations.narrative:
The hedgehog was treated at the AV's hospital on 12/20/2021 for mites and hypothermia. The AV instructed the facility to
add a heat lamp at night to maintain an enclosure temperature of at least 75 degrees. No heat lamp and no method of
monitoring temperatures have been implemented to date. Not following the instructions of the AV can lead to detrimental
effects to the animal. Per the regulations, each exhibitor shall assure that the attending veterinarian has appropriate
authority to ensure the provision of adequate veterinary care and to oversee the adequacy of other aspects of animal care
and use.er the regulations. Correct by 10Jan2022.

No records of acquisition, disposition, or animals on-hand were available for inspection. Acquisition information for 2
rabbits, 1 hedgehog and 1 chinchilla was not available. Per the regulations, every exhibitor shall make, keep, and
maintain adequate records or forms which fully and correctly disclose the required, detailed information in this section
concerning animals purchased or otherwise acquired, held, leased, or otherwise in his or her possession or under his or
her control, or which is transported, sold, euthanized or otherwise disposed of by that dealer or exhibitor.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the facility representative.
End Section
